price: بيا له هغو کسانو وي چې ايمان يې راوړی وي او يو بل ته په زغم او مهربانۍ وصيت کوي.
arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: thumma kāna mina alladhīna āmanū watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri watawāṣaw bil-marḥamati
